scripts.build: parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ --out-dir docs && del-cli docs/*.map docs/*.js docs/*.css docs/icon*.*.png docs/manifest.webmanifest && cpy src/cache.appcache src/manifest.webmanifest src/service-worker.js icon*.png docs && node -e "console.log('# version ' + (new Date()).toISOString());" >> docs/cache.appcache && node -e "console.log(' + \'' + (new Date()).toISOString().replace(/[^0-9]/g,'') + '\';');" >> docs/service-worker.js
